## 1.Convertim a variables numèriques i factors
```{r}
# Normalitza noms amb espais -> subratllats (opcional però recomanat)
names(df) <- gsub("[^A-Za-z0-9_]+", "_", names(df))
names(df) <- gsub("_+", "_", names(df))
names(df) <- sub("^_|_$", "", names(df))

to_numeric_safely <- function(x) {
  # Converteix factors/characters numèrics a numeric gestionant espais/buits
  if (is.factor(x)) x <- as.character(x)
  if (is.character(x)) {
    x <- trimws(x)
    x[x == ""] <- NA
    x <- suppressWarnings(as.numeric(x))
  }
  return(x)
}

# 1) Marital_status (1..6)
if ("Marital_status" %in% names(df)) {
  x <- to_numeric_safely(df$Marital_status)
  df$Marital_status <- factor(
    x, levels = 1:6,
    labels = c("Single","Married","Widower","Divorced","De facto union","Legally separated"),
    ordered = FALSE
  )
}
```

## 4. Eliminem outliers


```{r}
# Helper: conversió segura a numeric només si cal
to_numeric_safely <- function(x) {
  if (is.factor(x)) x <- as.character(x)
  if (is.character(x)) { x <- trimws(x); x[x == ""] <- NA; x <- suppressWarnings(as.numeric(x)) }
  x
}

# Inicialitza màscara
n <- nrow(df)
flag <- rep(FALSE, n)

# 1) Application_order > 7
x <- to_numeric_safely(df$Application_order)
flag <- flag | (!is.na(x) & x > 7)

# 2) Previous_qualification_grade > 175
x <- to_numeric_safely(df$Previous_qualification_grade)
flag <- flag | (!is.na(x) & x > 175)

# 3) Admission_grade > 175
x <- to_numeric_safely(df$Admission_grade)
flag <- flag | (!is.na(x) & x > 175)

# 4) Enrolled/Evaluations/Approved > 11 (1r i 2n semestre)
x <- to_numeric_safely(df$Curricular_units_1st_sem_enrolled)
flag <- flag | (!is.na(x) & x > 11)

x <- to_numeric_safely(df$Curricular_units_2nd_sem_enrolled)
flag <- flag | (!is.na(x) & x > 10)

x <- to_numeric_safely(df$Curricular_units_1st_sem_evaluations)
flag <- flag | (!is.na(x) & x > 10)

x <- to_numeric_safely(df$Curricular_units_2nd_sem_evaluations)
flag <- flag | (!is.na(x) & x > 10)

x <- to_numeric_safely(df$Curricular_units_1st_sem_approved)
flag <- flag | (!is.na(x) & x > 10)

x <- to_numeric_safely(df$Curricular_units_2nd_sem_approved)
flag <- flag | (!is.na(x) & x > 10)

# Informe i filtratge
cat("Outliers detectats:", sum(flag, na.rm = TRUE), "files\n")
df <- df[!flag, , drop = FALSE]

```


## 5. Transformem algunes variables

```{r}
# Vector de variables
vars <- c(
  "Curricular_units_1st_sem_enrolled",
  "Curricular_units_2nd_sem_enrolled",
  "Curricular_units_1st_sem_credited",
  "Curricular_units_2nd_sem_credited",
  "Curricular_units_1st_sem_evaluations",
  "Curricular_units_2nd_sem_evaluations",
  "Curricular_units_1st_sem_approved",
  "Curricular_units_2nd_sem_approved",
  "Curricular_units_1st_sem_without_evaluations",
  "Curricular_units_2nd_sem_without_evaluations",
  "Curricular_units_1st_sem_grade",
  "Curricular_units_2nd_sem_grade"
)

# Suposa que el teu dataframe es diu df
n <- length(vars)
nrow <- ceiling(n / 3)            # 3 columnes per defecte
op <- par(mfrow = c(1, 2),     # ajusta disposició
          mar = c(3.2, 3.2, 3.2, 0.8), oma = c(0,0,1,0), mgp = c(2,0.7,0))

on.exit(par(op), add = TRUE)

for (v in vars) {
  if (!v %in% names(df)) {
    plot.new()
    title(main = paste("Falta variable:", v), col.main = "red")
    next
  }
  x <- df[[v]]
  if (is.factor(x) || is.character(x)) {
    suppressWarnings(x <- as.numeric(as.character(x)))
  }
  x <- x[is.finite(x)]

  qqnorm(x,
         main = v,
         pch = 16, cex = 0.6, col = "#1f77b4")
  qqline(x, col = "#d62728", lwd = 1.5)
}

```
